title: Request Certificate of Origin for Export
description: A customer is moving internationally and needs a Certificate of Origin for their vehicle to export it.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's identity and ownership of the vehicle.
Explain the process for requesting the official document and any associated fees.
Submit a formal request to the manufacturer's homologation department to issue the Certificate of Origin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and escalates the request to the correct department.
